incantations.name: Ancient Dragons' Lightning Strike
incantations.description: A secret incantation of the capital's ancient dragon cult.
incantations.effects: Summons red lightning that spreads from impact
incantations.comment: Book from crumbling farum azula!

incantations.name: Aspects Of The Crucible: Horns
incantations.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
incantations.effects: creates shoulder horn to gore foes from a low stance.

incantations.name: Agheel's Flame
incantations.description: Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power of the flying dragon Agheel.
incantations.effects: Spews flame breath of Agheel from above

incantations.name: Aspects Of The Crucible: Tail
incantations.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
incantations.effects: Creates supple tail to sweep area before caster

incantations.name: Barrier Of Gold
incantations.description: One of the incantations of Erdtree Worship.
incantations.effects: Greatly increases magic damage negation for self & allies
incantations.comment: Leyndell, Royal Capital: Dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab. Can be found after heading down the stairs and taking the elevator, right after the fight with Godfrey, First Elden Lord (Golden Shade)

incantations.name: Ancient Dragons' Lightning Spear
incantations.description: A secret incantation of the capital's ancient dragon cult.
incantations.effects: Stabs with red lightning spear from above
incantations.comment: Book from crumbling farum azula!

incantations.name: Beast Claw
incantations.description: Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
incantations.effects: Creates claws that tear through the land.

incantations.name: Aspect Of The Crucible: Breath
incantations.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
incantations.effects: Creates throat pouch to spew fire while walking

incantations.name: Bestial Constitution
incantations.description: Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
incantations.effects: Alleviates blood loss and frost buildup
incantations.comment:
READY!
Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab along the cliffside northeast of the Minor Erdtree in Dragonbarrow;

incantations.name: Bestial Sling
incantations.description: Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman. Swiftly flings a number of sharp rock shards. This incantation can be cast without delay after performing another action. It is said that in the time before the Erdtree, stones were the first weapons of the beasts who had gained intelligence.
incantations.effects: Swiftly flings numerous sharp rock shards

incantations.name: Black Blade
incantations.description: Power gleaned from the remembrance of Maliketh.
incantations.effects: Black blade spinning slash that emits wave of light.

incantations.name: Black Flame Ritual
incantations.description: Superior black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles.
incantations.effects: Summons circle of black flame pillars around caster.
incantations.comment: The Spiritcaller Cave is found in the Mountaintops of the Giants

incantations.name: Black Flame
incantations.description: A black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles.
incantations.effects: Throws a ball of raging black fire

incantations.name: Black Flame Blade
incantations.description: A black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles.
incantations.effects: Enchants right-hand armament with black flame

incantations.name: Bestial Vitality
incantations.description: Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
incantations.effects: Heals HP over a period of time

incantations.name: Black Flame's Protection
incantations.description: A black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles.
incantations.effects: Increases phyiscal damage negation
incantations.comment:
Received from Gideon Ofnir, after selecting the "about the secret medallion" dialogue option. In order for this question to appear, you will first need Haligtree Secret Medallion (Left) and Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right). The dialogue option is unlocked upon reaching Miquella's Haligtree.
If not received by Gideon Ofnir, it can be purchased at Twin Maiden Husks after reaching Leyndell, Ashen Capital.

incantations.name: Blessing's Boon
incantations.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
incantations.effects: Grants blessing to self and nearby allies

incantations.name: Blessing Of The Erdtree
incantations.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations
incantations.effects: Grants greater blessing to self and nearby allies
incantations.comment:
READY!
Queen's Bedchamber - Leyndell

incantations.name: Bloodflame Blade
incantations.description: A Blood Oath incantation, granted by the Lord of Blood. Engulfs armament held in the right hand with bloodflame. This incantation can be cast while in motion. After dealing damage, bloodflame continues to build up onset of blood loss for a very short time.
incantations.effects: Enchants right-hand armament with bloodflame

incantations.name: Bloodflame Talons
incantations.description: A Blood Oath incantation, granted by the Lord of Blood.
incantations.effects: Creates bloodflame lacerations that then explode
incantations.comment: Dropped by Mohg, the Omen in Forsaken Depths, Subterranean Shunning-Grounds, under Leyndell.

incantations.name: Bloodboon
incantations.description: Sacred incantation of Mohg, Lord of Blood.
incantations.effects: Scatters bloodflame before caster to set area aflame.
incantations.comment: Defeat Mogh - Remembrance of the Blood Lord

incantations.name: Borealis's Mist
incantations.description: Superior incantation of Dragon Communion.
incantations.effects: Spews icy breath of Borealis from above
incantations.comment: Defeat Borealis - Mountaintop of the giants

incantations.name: Cure Poison
incantations.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.
incantations.effects: Cures Poison ailment and reduces poison build-up.

incantations.name: Burn O Flame!
incantations.description: One of the incantations that draws directly from the power of the
incantations.effects: Raises a series of flame pillars around caster

incantations.name: Darkness
incantations.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' servants, who once served as the
incantations.effects: Creates area of darkness that conceals caster

incantations.name: Death Lightning
incantations.description: Incantation that channels the power of the ancient dragon
incantations.effects: Strikes surroundings with storm of death lightning

incantations.name: Discus Of Light
incantations.description: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
incantations.effects: Fires ring of light before the caster

incantations.name: Divine Fortification
incantations.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.
incantations.effects: Increases holy damage negation.

incantations.name: Dragonbolt Blessing
incantations.description: Superior incantation of the capital's ancient dragon cult. Summons lightning to bolster the caster's body. Attacks become easier to deflect and resistance to all ailments is increased. However, lightning damage negation will be reduced. Only those loved by dragons can survive the ordeal of cladding their bodies in lightning.
incantations.effects: Bolsters caster's body with lightning

incantations.name: Dragonice
incantations.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
incantations.effects: Channels dragon to spew icy breath

incantations.name: Dragonclaw
incantations.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
incantations.effects: Channels dragon to rend foes with dragon claws

incantations.name: Dragonfire
incantations.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
incantations.effects: Channels dragon to spew flame breath

incantations.name: Dragonmaw
incantations.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
incantations.effects: Channels dragon to bite foes before caster

incantations.name: Ekzyke's Decay
incantations.description: Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power of Ekzykes, the Decaying.
incantations.effects: Spews scarlet rot breath of Ekzykes from above.

incantations.name: Ekzykes's Decay
incantations.description: Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power of Ekzykes, the Decaying.
incantations.effects: Spews scarlet rot breath of Ekzykes from above

incantations.name: Fire's Deadly Sin
incantations.description: Incantation originating from a deeply ominous prophecy.
incantations.effects: Sets area and self ablaze with raging flames

incantations.name: Erdtree Heal
incantations.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
incantations.effects: Vastly heals HP for self and nearby allies
incantations.comment: Queen's Bedchamber in Leyndell, Ashen Capital

incantations.name: Flame, Fall Upon Them
incantations.description: One of the incantations that draws directly from the power of the
incantations.effects: Hurls several balls of fire at once

incantations.name: Ezykes's Decay
incantations.description: Spews scarlet rot breath of Ekzykes from above

incantations.name: Electrify Armament
incantations.description: One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult.
incantations.effects: Enchants right-hand armament with lightning damage

incantations.name: Flame Fortification
incantations.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.
incantations.effects: Increases fire damage negation.
incantations.comment: I should have this, sells from brother Corwyn at table hold

incantations.name: Flame Of The Fell God
incantations.description: This legendary incantation is one of several that draws directly from the power of the Fire Giants. Releases a ball of raging fire said to be inhabited by a fell god. The fireball floats toward enemies and explodes, setting the area ablaze. Arghanthy, the chief guardian of the Flame, had kept this incantation a well-kept secret until it was stolen by Adan. The fell god still lurks within the Fire Giants.
incantations.effects: Summons raging fireball that explodes and sets the area ablaze

incantations.name: Elden Stars
incantations.description: This legendary incantation is the most ancient of those that derive from the Erdtree.
incantations.effects: Creates a steam of golden shooting stars that assail the area.

incantations.name: Flame, Protect Me
incantations.description: The most ancient of the Fire Monks' incantations.
incantations.effects: Greatly increases fire damage negation

incantations.name: Fortissax's Lightning Spear
incantations.description: Incantation that channels the power of the ancient dragon Fortissax.
incantations.effects: Stabs from above with two red lightning spears in tandem

incantations.name: Frozen Lightning Spear
incantations.description: Incantation that channels the power of the Dragonkin Soldiers. Creates a spear of ice lightning and stabs it into the ground from above. On impact, the spear will burst into trails of lightning advancing forwards. The Dragonkin were born in the Eternal City, where they knew no true sky, nor true lightning. Instead, ice lightning was their weapon.
incantations.effects: Stabs with ice lightning spear from above

incantations.name: Glintstone Breath
incantations.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
incantations.effects: Channels dragon to spew icy breath.

incantations.name: Golden Lightning Fortification
incantations.description: An incantation of Erdtree Worship.
incantations.effects: Greatly increases lightning resistance for self and allies
incantations.comment: Crumbling Farum Azula

incantations.name: Frenzied Burst
incantations.description: Incantations originating from the maddening Three Fingers.
incantations.effects: Emits concentrated blast of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes

incantations.name: Giantsflame Take Thee
incantations.description: One of the incantations that draws directly from the power of the
incantations.effects: Hurls massive ball of raging fire

incantations.name: Golden Vow (spell)
incantations.description: An incantation of Erdtree Worship.
incantations.effects: Increases attack and defense for self and allies
incantations.comment: READY! Mt gelmir!

incantations.name: Gurrang's Beast Claw
incantations.description: Superior incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
incantations.effects: Creates beast claws to rend surroundings with shockwaves

incantations.name: Immutable Shield
incantations.description: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
incantations.effects: Increases left-hand shield's affinity/ailment resistance

incantations.name: Heal
incantations.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.
incantations.effects: Heals HP for you and nearby allies.

incantations.name: Howl Of Shabriri
incantations.description: Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.
incantations.effects: Shrieks, building up madness in nearby foes

incantations.name: Great Heal
incantations.description: Superior incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.
incantations.effects: Greatly Heals HP for self and nearby allies

incantations.name: Greyoll's Roar
incantations.description: Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power of Greyoll, the Elder Dragon. An incantation of legendary status.
incantations.effects: Emits the roar of Elder Dragon Greyoll.

incantations.name: Inescapable Frenzy
incantations.description: Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.
incantations.effects: Latches onto foes to spread madness

incantations.name: Honed Bolt
incantations.description: One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult.
incantations.effects: Strikes foe with lightning bolt from above

incantations.name: Lansseax's Glaive
incantations.description: Incantation that channels the powr of the ancient dragon Lansseax.
incantations.effects: Sweeps from above with red lightning glaive.

incantations.name: Lightning Fortification
incantations.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.
incantations.effects: Increass lighting damage negation

incantations.name: Lord's Aid
incantations.description: Incantation bestowed by the Two Fingers upon the Tarnished
incantations.effects: Alleviates poison / blood loss / sleep buildup for self / allies

incantations.name: Lightning Spear
incantations.description: One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult. Summons a lightning spear and hurls it before the caster. Charging causes a lightning bolt to strike the point ofimpact. Long ago, Godwyn the Golden defeated the ancient dragon Fortissax, and befriended his fallen foe — an event that gave rise to the ancient dragon cult in the capital.
incantations.effects: Hurls lightning spear before caster

incantations.name: Law Of Causality
incantations.description: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
incantations.effects: Retaliates upon receiving a number of blows

incantations.name: Litany Of Proper Death
incantations.description: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
incantations.effects: Creates image of Order to deal holy damage

incantations.name: Law Of Regression
incantations.description: Incantation of the Golden Order fundamentalists. One of the key fundamentals. Heals all negative statuses, dispels special effects, and reveals mimicry in all its forms. The fundamentalists describe the Golden Order through the powers of regression and causality. Regression is the pull of meaning; that all things yearn eternally to converge.
incantations.effects: Heals all ailments and dispels all special effects

incantations.name: Lightning Strike
incantations.description: One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult.
incantations.effects: Summons lightning bolt that spreads from impact.
incantations.comment: READY. -  Weeping peninsula! east of eardtree

incantations.name: Lord's Divine Fortification
incantations.description: Incantation taught to Gideon the All-Knowing by the Two
incantations.effects: Greatly increases holy damage negation incl. allies
incantations.comment: Defeat Malenia first, then google again

incantations.name: Lord's Heal
incantations.description: Incantation bestowed by the Two Fingers upon the Tarnished
incantations.effects: Massively heals HP for self and nearby allies

incantations.name: Order Healing
incantations.description: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
incantations.effects: Alleviates death blight buildup

incantations.name: Noble Presence
incantations.description: Ancient power of the Godskin Nobles.
incantations.effects: Thrust out belly with gusto to unelash repelling shockwave
incantations.comment: Godskin noble in volcano manor, didn't I kill him already?

incantations.name: Order's Blade
incantations.description: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists. Used by hunters of Those Who Live in Death. Enchants armament held in the right hand with holy-affinity attacks. This incantation is especially damaging to Those Who Live in Death. Any felled by this incantation cannot be revived. The role of the hunters is to stamp out defiled reason - all for the perfection of the Golden Order.
incantations.effects: Enchanted right-hand armament with holy damage

incantations.name: Magic Fortification
incantations.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful. Increases magic damage negation. This incantation can be cast while in motion. Follow the path that has been set for you, and you will make enemies of all others: the monks, the sorcerers, the ancient dragon knights, and the scions of gold. Heed me – the Lands Between offers no welcome to the Tarnished.
incantations.effects: Increases magic damage negation

incantations.name: O, Flame!
incantations.description: Incantation of the Fire Monks.
incantations.effects: Momentarily sparks roaring flame from hand

incantations.name: Magma Breath
incantations.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
incantations.effects: Channels wyrm to spew magma breath

incantations.name: Pest Threads
incantations.description: Incantation of the servants of rot.
incantations.effects: Launches countless sticky threads before caster

incantations.name: Protection Of The Erdtree
incantations.description: A superior incantation of Erdtree Worship. Increase damage negation for all affinities except physical, for both the caster and nearby allies. Hold to continue praying and delay activation. In the beginning, everything was in opposition to the Erdtree. But through countless victories in war, it became the embodiment of Order.
incantations.effects: Increases affinity damage negation for self & allies

incantations.name: Poison Armament
incantations.description: Incantation of the servants of rot. Enchants armament held in the right hand with poison. This incantation can be cast while in motion. Those who dwell within poison know rot all too well. The death that begets life, that comes to all equally. That is to say: it is the cycle of rebirth put into practice.

incantations.name: Placidusax's Ruin
incantations.description: Power gleaned form the remembrance of Dragonlord Placidusax.
incantations.effects: Spews golden breath of Dragonlord Placidusax

incantations.name: Poison Mist
incantations.description: Incantation of the servants of rot.
incantations.effects: Releases poison mist before caster.

incantations.name: Radagon's Rings Of Light
incantations.description: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
incantations.effects: Creates golden ring of light to attack wide area
incantations.comment: Should sell from Brother corwyn now, try to find it

incantations.name: Rotten Breath
incantations.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
incantations.effects: Channels dragon to spew scarlet rot breath

incantations.name: Rejection
incantations.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.
incantations.effects: Produces a shockwave that pushes away foes.

incantations.name: Smarag's Glintstone Breath
incantations.description: Superior incantation of Dragon Communion.
incantations.effects: Spews magic breath of Glintstone Dragon Smarag from above

incantations.name: Stone Of Gurranq
incantations.description: Superior incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
incantations.effects: Hurls a boulder before the caster

incantations.name: Surge, O Flame!
incantations.description: Superior incantation of the Fire Monks.
incantations.effects: Incinerates area before caster with stream of fire

incantations.name: Shadow Bait
incantations.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' sewants, who once served as the
incantations.effects: Creates shadow that lures the aggression of foes of human build

incantations.name: Scouring Black Flame
incantations.description: A black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles. Sweeps a wide area before the caster with black flame. Charging enhances range. The black flame could once slay gods. But when Maliketh sealed Destined Death, the true power of the black flame was lost.
incantations.effects: Sweeps area before caster with black flame

incantations.name: Scarlet Aeonia
incantations.description: Technique of Malenia, the Goddess of Rot.
incantations.effects: Creates a giant flower that explodes with scarlet rot.

incantations.name: Swarm Of Flies
incantations.description: A Blood Oath incantation, shared from the Lord of Blood's power. Releases a swarm of bloodflies before the caster to assault foes. The vile swarm deals damage and builds up onset of blood loss. This incantation can be cast while in motion. The new palace of the Lord of Blood lies in a swamp of festering blood, and these flies are said to spawn from excrement in that land.
incantations.effects: Releases a swarm of bloodflies before the caster
incantations.comment: Mohgwyn Palace

incantations.name: The Flame Of Frenzy
incantations.description: Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.
incantations.effects: Emits burst of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes

incantations.name: Theodorix's Magma
incantations.description: Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power of the great wyrm Theodorix. Transforms caster into a great wyrm to spew a large volume of magma breath. Allows one follow-up attack. The name of the ancient troll warrior Theodorix lives on — as a hero of the War against the Giants.
incantations.effects: Spews magma breath of Theodorix from above
incantations.comment: Consacrated snowfield

incantations.name: Unendurable Frenzy
incantations.description: Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers. Causes the yellow flame of frenzy to violently burst forth from the caster's eyes. Hold to continue channeling the flame. This incantation can be used while in motion. It is the maddening pain and unstoppable tears of those afflicted with the flame of frenzy brought into being.
incantations.effects: Emits violent burst of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes.
incantations.comment: Yelough Anix Ruins in Consacrated snowfields

incantations.name: Triple Rings Of Light
incantations.description: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists. Produces three rings of light and fires them forwards. The rings of light return to a position close to the caster before disappearing. This incantation can be cast repeatedly. A gift from the young Ivliquella to his father, Radagon.
incantations.effects: Fire three rings of light before the caster
incantations.comment: Elphael, Brace of The Haligtree

incantations.name: Whirl, O Flame!
incantations.description: Superior Incantation of the Fire Monks.
incantations.effects: Sweeps area before caster with stream of fire

incantations.name: Vyke's Dragonbolt
incantations.description: Incantation of Vyke, knight of the Roundtable Hold.
incantations.effects: Enchants right-hand armament with lightning damage
incantations.comment: Lord Contender's Evergaol in Mountain top of giants

incantations.name: Urgent Heal
incantations.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers faithful.
incantations.effects: Heals a small amount of HP.

incantations.name: Wrath Of Gold
incantations.description: Superior Erdtree Worship incantation. Produces a golden shockwave that knocks back nearby foes. Charging increases the size of the shockwave. This incantation was discovered when the Elden Ring was shattered, and it was feared as a sign of the Erdtree's wrath.
incantations.effects: Produces golden shockwave that knocks back foes

sorceries.name: Briars Of Punishment
sorceries.description: An aberrant sorcery discovered by exiled criminals. Theirs are the sorceries most reviled by the academy. Wounds the caster with thorns of sin, sending a trail of bloodthorns running over the ground to impale enemies from below. This sorcery can be cast repeatedly. The guilty, their eyes gouged by thorns, lived in eternal darkness. There, they discovered the blood star.
sorceries.effects: Wounds caster to unleash trail of bloodthrorns

sorceries.name: Ancient Death Rancor
sorceries.description: Sorcery of the servants of Death.
sorceries.effects: Summons horde of vengeful spirits that chase down foes

sorceries.name: Briars Of Sin
sorceries.description: An aberrant sorcery, discovered along with red glintstone by those exiled to the north for their crimes. Summons large thorns from a whorl of blood shed by one's own hand in penance for sins. This sorcery can be cast repeatedly. The Academy reviles this sorcery, which draws its power from faith.
sorceries.effects: Summons thorns from a whorl of your own blood.

sorceries.name: Cannon Of Haima
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria. Lobs an explosive magic projectile that flies in an arc. Charging enhances potency. Drawn from the conspectus of Haima, the adjudicator of the academy, this sorcery employs might as a means to quell conflict.
sorceries.effects: Lobs an explosive magic projectile in an arc

sorceries.name: Ambush Shard
sorceries.description: One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery. Launches a projectile from a distance removed from the caster, so as to strike the enemy from behind. This sorcery can be cast repeatedly. The Sellian sorcerers were assassins, and it is said that they often hunted their fellows.
sorceries.effects: Strikes from behind with projectile fired from distance

sorceries.name: Carian Phalanx
sorceries.description: One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.
sorceries.effects: Forms a defensive arch of numerous magic glintblades

sorceries.name: Adula's Moonblade
sorceries.description: Sorcery of Adula, the Glintstone Dragon. Conjures a cold magic greatsword, then delivers a sweeping blow that launches a blade-like projectile of frost. This sorcery can be cast repeatedly. Adula, a devourer of sorcerers, was bested by Ranni and subsequently swore a knightly oath to her Dark Moon.
sorceries.effects: Sweeping slash followed by cold blade projectile

sorceries.name: Carian Greatsword
sorceries.description: One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family. Conjures a magic greatsword and then delivers a sweeping blow. This sorcery can be cast repeatedly. Armed with this spell, sorcerers gain the strength of knights, their loyalty sworn to the moon.
sorceries.effects: Performs sweeping slash using magical greatsword

sorceries.name: Carian Piercer
sorceries.description: One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.
sorceries.effects: Impales foes with magical greatsword

sorceries.name: Carian Retaliation
sorceries.description: One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.
sorceries.effects: Dispels enemy spells and retaliates with glintblades

sorceries.name: Carian Slicer
sorceries.description: One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.
sorceries.effects: Performs swift sweeping slash using magical sword

sorceries.name: Crystal Barrage
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
sorceries.effects: Fires a volley of glintstone crystal shards

sorceries.name: Collapsing Stars
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries that manipulates gravitational forces.
sorceries.effects: Pulls foes toward caster with gravity projectile volley

sorceries.name: Comet Azur
sorceries.description: Legendary sorcery devised by Azur, primeval sorcerer. Fires a tremendous comet in a torrent akin to the distant starry expanse, the place said to be the origin of glintstone. Hold to continue releasing the sorcery's power. When Azur glimpsed into the primeval current, he saw darkness. He was left both bewitched and fearful of the abyss.
sorceries.effects: Fires a tremendous comet within a starry torrent

sorceries.name: Crystal Burst
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria. Fires a burst of glintstone crystal shards. This sorcery can be cast repeatedly and while in motion. Charging increases potency. A sorcery of the Crystal Cadre, a group of sorcerers who pursued the wisdom of stone - the secrets locked in the faint cogitation of the Crystalians.
sorceries.effects: Fires a burst of glintstone crystal shards

sorceries.name: Comet
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria. Fires a great magical comet. This sorcery can be cast repeatedly and while in motion. Charging enhances potency. The greatest of the Karolos Conspectus's sorceries, that only a very few sorcerers have ever mastered.
sorceries.effects: Fires a great magic comet

sorceries.name: Crystal Torrent
sorceries.description: Sorcery of the mysterious Crystalians.
sorceries.effects: Creates crystal mass that fires stream of crystal shards

sorceries.name: Crystal Release
sorceries.description: Sorcery of the mysterious Crystalians. Creates a mass of crystal, then shatters it to scour a wide area with a violent rain of crystal shards. This sorcery is used by high-ranking adepts among the Crystalians. Some also call this sorcery "the Crystal Sun."
sorceries.effects: Scours area with violent rain of crystal shards

sorceries.name: Fia's Mist
sorceries.description: Sorcery of Fia, the Deathbed Companion. Creates a deathly mist before the caster, which inflicts Death blight upon those who enter. This sorcery can be cast while in motion. Charging enhances range of the mist. This sorcery was developed to oppose the Roundtable Hold, and is effective only against the Tarnished.
sorceries.effects: Release a mist of death before caster

sorceries.name: Eternal Darkness
sorceries.description: Forbidden sorcery of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.
sorceries.effects: Creates a dark space that draws in spells

sorceries.name: Frozen Armament
sorceries.description: Sorcery said to have been used by the old snow witch. Enchants armament held in the right hand with frost. This sorcery can be cast while in motion. The snowy crone taught the young Ranni to fear the dark moon as she imparted her cold sorcery.
sorceries.effects: Enchants right-hand armament with frost

sorceries.name: Founding Rain Of Stars
sorceries.description: The eldest primeval sorcery, said to have been discovered by an
sorceries.effects: Releases a downpour of star rain for a while

sorceries.name: Explosive Ghostflame
sorceries.description: Sorcery of the servants of Death.
sorceries.effects: Causes ghostflame explosion that burns wide area

sorceries.name: Freezing Mist
sorceries.description: Sorcery said to have been used by the old snow witch.
sorceries.effects: Releases cold mist before caster

sorceries.name: Gelmir's Fury
sorceries.description: One of the sorceries developed from the magma of Mt. Gelmir.
sorceries.effects: Covers area with surge of magma from the earth

sorceries.name: Gavel Of Haima
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria. Creates a magical greathammer and slams it down. Allows one follow-up attack. Drawn from the scholarly conspectus of Haima, the adjudicator of the academy, this sorcery employs might as a means to quell conflict.
sorceries.effects: Attacks using a magic greathammer

sorceries.name: Glintstone Arc
sorceries.description: Fires a horizontal arc of magic that spreads outward. This sorcery can be cast repeteadly and while in motion.
sorceries.effects: Fires a horizontally-widening magic arc

sorceries.name: Glintstone Cometshard
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria. Fires a magical comet with a trailing tail. This sorcery can be cast repeatedly and while in motion. Charging enhances potency. A sorcery of the Karolos Conspectus, the most venerable of the academy.
sorceries.effects: Fires a magic comet with a trailing tail

sorceries.name: Glintstone Pebble
sorceries.description: The most basic glintstone sorcery of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
sorceries.effects: Fires magic projectiles from glintstone

sorceries.name: Glintstone Stars
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
sorceries.effects: Fires three shooting stars that pursue foes

sorceries.name: Glintstone Icecrag
sorceries.description: Sorcery said to have been used by the old snow witch.
sorceries.effects: Fires mass of cold magic from glintstone

sorceries.name: Glintblade Phalanx
sorceries.description: One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.
sorceries.effects: Forms a defensive arch of magic glintblades

sorceries.name: Gravity Well
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries that manipulates gravitational forces. Fires a projectile of condensed gravitational force. Those struck by it will be pulled toward the caster. Charging enhances potency. A gravitational technique studied by the young Radahn. His master was an Alabaster Lord with skin of stone.
sorceries.effects: Pulls foes toward caster with gravity projectile

sorceries.name: Great Glintstone Shard
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria. The glintstone serves as a conduit, launching large magical projectiles at foes. This sorcery can be cast repeatedly and while in motion. Those unworthy of the stone crown typically end their brief journey into sorcery here.
sorceries.effects: Fires larger magic projectiles from glintstone

sorceries.name: Lucidity
sorceries.description: One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.
sorceries.effects: Alleviates buildup of sleep and madness

sorceries.name: Greatblade Phalanx
sorceries.description: One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family. Creates a defensive arch of larger magic glintblades overhead, which automatically attack nearby foes. Used by the enchanted troll knights. They were the comrades of the young Rennala, bound by oath.
sorceries.effects: Forms a defensive arch of larger magic glintblades

sorceries.name: Great Oracular Bubble
sorceries.description: Sorcery of the claymen who served as priests in the ancient
sorceries.effects: Launches a large magic bubble

sorceries.name: Oracle Bubble
sorceries.description: Sorcery of the claymen who served as priests in the ancient dynasty.
sorceries.effects: Launches several bubbles of magic.

sorceries.name: Loretta's Greatbow
sorceries.description: Sorcery used by Royal Knight Loretta. Creates a magic greatbow and fires a great arrow. Charging enhances potency. Hold to keep the great arrow nocked. It is said that the bow was Loretta's favored weapon.
sorceries.effects: Fires great arrow from a magic greatbow

sorceries.name: Loretta's Mastery
sorceries.description: Sorcery used by Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree. Creates a magic greatbow and fires four great arrows simultaneously. Charging enhances potency. Hold to keep the great arrows nocked. Developed by Loretta after her long, bloody journey to seek out a place where the Albinaurics could live in peace.
sorceries.effects: Fires four great arrow from a magic greatbow at once

sorceries.name: Magic Downpour
sorceries.description: One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.
sorceries.effects: Summon a magic mass that sprays projectiles over area

sorceries.name: Magma Shot
sorceries.description: One of the sorceries developed from the magma of Mt. Gelmir.
sorceries.effects: Fire lump of magma that explodes on contact

sorceries.name: Meteorite
sorceries.description: A glintstone sorcery that draws on gravitational force, used by a great white king with stone skin. Calls small meteorites down from the sky. The meteor shower continues for as long as the sorcery is in effect. It is said that, in the Eternal City, now lost in ruin underground, meteorites held the same import as stars.
sorceries.effects: Calls small meteors down from the sky.

sorceries.name: Night Comet
sorceries.description: One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.
sorceries.effects: Fires semi-invisible magic comet

sorceries.name: Meteorite Of Astel
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries that manipulates gravitational forces. Summons a void that emits a hail of meteorites. Hold to continue the effect. A manifestation of the power with which Astel leveled the Eternal City.
sorceries.effects: Calls a hail of small meteorites from the void.

sorceries.name: Night Shard
sorceries.description: One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.
sorceries.effects: Swiftly fires a semi-invisible

sorceries.name: Night Maiden's Mist
sorceries.description: One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.
sorceries.effects: Releases life-sapping silver mist before caster

sorceries.name: Rancorcall
sorceries.description: Sorcery of the servants of Death.
sorceries.effects: Summons vengeful spirits that chase down foes

sorceries.name: Oracle Bubbles
sorceries.description: Sorcery of the claymen who served as priests in the ancient
sorceries.effects: Launches several small magic bubbles.

sorceries.name: Rennala's Full Moon
sorceries.description: Sorcery associated with the Carian queen. Uses the caster as a vessel to incarnate a full moon, then sends it floating toward foes. The full moon dispels all sorcery that touches it, and temporarily reduces magic damage negation for those it strikes. Queen Rennala encountered this enchanting moon when she was young, and later, it would bewitch the academy.
sorceries.effects: Incarnate a full moon and launch it at foes

sorceries.name: Ranni's Dark Moon
sorceries.description: Legendary sorcery associated with the Carian queen.
sorceries.effects: Incarnate a cold, dark moon and launch it at foes.

sorceries.name: Rock Blaster
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
sorceries.effects: Thurst staff into ground to emit a massive shockwave

sorceries.name: Roiling Magma
sorceries.description: One of the sorceries developed from the magma of Mt. Gelmir. Fires a lump of condensed magma that explodes a short delay after hitting the target. Charging enhances potency and further delays the explosion. After discovering the ancient hexes of Gelmir, Rykard, son of Queen Rennala, brought them back into practical use as new forms of sorcery.
sorceries.effects: Fires lump of magma that explodes after delay

sorceries.name: Rykard's Rancor
sorceries.description: The terrible power of Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy.
sorceries.effects: Releases searing spirits that repeatedly explode after delay

sorceries.name: Rock Sling
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries that manipulates gravitational forces.
sorceries.effects: Summons rocks from the earth and sends its flying

sorceries.name: Scholar's Armament
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
sorceries.effects: Enchants right-hand armament with magic damage

sorceries.name: Scholar's Shield
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
sorceries.effects: Enhances left-handed shield damage negation

sorceries.name: Shard Spiral
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
sorceries.effects: Fire twin spiraling projectiles

sorceries.name: Shatter Earth
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria. Imbues the ferrule of the caster's staff with magic, then thrusts it into the ground to create a magical shockwave. Allows one follow-up attack. A Stonedigger sorcery used by the glintstone miners of the crystal tunnel. At the academy, use of this sorcery was a stigma that marked out failed scholars.
sorceries.effects: Thrust staff into ground to emit a shockwave

sorceries.name: Starlight
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
sorceries.effects: Creates star light to illuminate surroundings

sorceries.name: Star Shower
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria. Fires six magic shooting stars that pursue the target. This sorcery can be cast while in motion. Charging enhances potency. The most difficult to master of the Olivinus Conspectus sorceries.
sorceries.effects: Fires six shooting stars that pursue foes

sorceries.name: Stars Of Ruin
sorceries.description: Legendary sorcery devised by Lusat, primeval sorcerers.
sorceries.effects: Fire twelve dark shooting stars that pursue foes

sorceries.name: Shattering Crystal
sorceries.description: Sorcery of the mysterious Crystalians. Creates a mass of crystal, then shatters it in a forward burst. Charging enhances potency. The Crystalians are inorganic beings, yet they live. They cleave close to the ideals of the primeval current, and as such, they are revered guests of the sorcerers.
sorceries.effects: Creates crystal mass that shatters in forward burst

sorceries.name: Swift Glintstone Shard
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria. The glintstone serves as a conduit, launching swift magical projectiles at foes. This sorcery can be used without delay after performing another action. Those unworthy of the stone crown typically end their brief journey into sorcery here.
sorceries.effects: Swiftly fires magic projectiles from glintstone

sorceries.name: Terra Magicus
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria. Draws an academy sigil upon the ground, raising the magic strength of those within. Once, the sigil would be cast from the highest belfry of the academy, covering the entire institution's grounds. This spell allows such vivid experience of spell—casting success, it turns many a fledgling into a true sorcerer in a flash of newfound understanding.
sorceries.effects: Raises the magic strength of those within the sigil

sorceries.name: Unseen Blade
sorceries.description: One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery. Enchants armament held in right hand, making it completely invisible. This sorcery can be cast while in motion. Used by Sellian assassins to present themselves as unarmed sorcerers.
sorceries.effects: Makes right-hand armament completely invisible

sorceries.name: Unseen Form
sorceries.description: One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery. Makes the caster semi-invisible. While on horseback, effect extends to cover the mount. This sorcery can be cast while in motion. The Sellian assassins considered every option that aided their dirty work.
sorceries.effects: Makes the caster semi-invisible

sorceries.name: Thops's Barrier
sorceries.description: The lifelong pursuit of Thops the Bluntstone.
sorceries.effects: Erect a magic forcefield to deflect spells

sorceries.name: Zamor Ice Storm
sorceries.description: Ice sorcery of the Town of Zamor.
sorceries.effects: Thrust staff into ground to create freezing tornado.

sorceries.name: Tibia's Summons
sorceries.description: Sorcery of the servants of Death. Summons a group of Those Lost in Death. Three skeletons will appear some distance from the caster and attack foes before disappearing. The dead have long been left to wander; what they need is leadership.
sorceries.effects: Summons Those Who Live in Death

talismans.name: Arrow's Sting Talisman
talismans.description: A talisman depicting three iron arrows. Carried by soldiers long ago.
talismans.effect: Raises attack power of arrows and bolts

talismans.name: Arsenal Charm
talismans.description: An iron charm that resembles a mass of weaponry. Boosts maximum equipment load. This talisman was derived from an unusual greatsword, once wielded by a hero hungry for vengeance.

talismans.name: Assassin's Cerulean Dagger
talismans.description: An assassin's dagger, misshapen and stained in cerulean. Critical hits restore FP.

talismans.name: Assassin's Crimson Dagger
talismans.description: An assassin's dagger, misshapen and stained in crimson. Critical hits restore HP.

talismans.name: Arrow's Reach Talisman
talismans.description: A talisman depicting three arrows. Carried by hunters of beasts.

talismans.name: Axe Talisman
talismans.description: A talisman depicting an axe and a warrior. Enhances charge attacks.

talismans.name: Boltdrake Talisman
talismans.description: Talisman depicting a yellow ancient dragon. Boosts lightning damage negation.

talismans.name: Blue Dancer Charm
talismans.description: A cloth doll depicting a dancer garbed in blue. An ancient heirloom of some sort.
talismans.effect: Raises attack power with lower equipment load

talismans.name: Blessed Dew Talisman
talismans.description: Talisman depicting a drop of the Erdtree's sap, a blessed boon.

talismans.name: Bull-goat's Talisman
talismans.description: A talisman depicting the horns of a bull-goat. Raises poise.

talismans.name: Cerulean Amber Medallion
talismans.description: A medallion with cerulean amber inlaid. Boosts maximum FP.

talismans.name: Carian Filigreed Crest
talismans.description: A talisman adorned with the royal crest.

talismans.name: Cerulean Seed Talisman
talismans.description: A cerulean-colored talisman patterned after an Erdtree seed. Boosts FP restoration from the Flask of Cerulean Tears.
talismans.effect: Boosts FP restoration from Flask of Cerulean Tears

talismans.name: Clarifying Horn Charm
talismans.description: An accoutrement worn by the ancestral followers. Raises focus. (Focus governs resistance to sleep and madness.)

talismans.name: Claw Talisman
talismans.description: A talisman depicting a claw and an assassin. Enhances jump attacks.

talismans.name: Crucible Knot Talisman
talismans.description: A talisman fashioned from a bony knot that embodies that aspects of various creatures. Said to have grown on the human body long ago.
talismans.effect: Reduces damage and impact of headshots

talismans.name: Crimson Amber Medallion
talismans.description: A medallion with Crimson amber inlaid. Boosts maximum HP. The Erdtree's old sap becomes amber, treasured as the most precious of jewels in the age of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. A primordial life energy resides inside

talismans.name: Crucible Scale Talisman
talismans.description: A talisman fashioned from a scale that embodies the aspects of various creatures. Said to have grown on the human body long ago.
talismans.effect: Reduces damage taken from critical hits

talismans.name: Crepus's Vial
talismans.description: Small mysterious bottle with a dark mist sealed within.
talismans.effect: Eliminates all sound made by the wearer during movement

talismans.name: Curved Sword Talisman
talismans.description: A talisman depicting a curved sword and a swordsman. Enhances guard counters.

talismans.name: Dragoncrest Shield Talisman
talismans.description: Wrought iron talisman depicting a trio of ancient dragons. Boosts physical damage negation.

talismans.name: Flamedrake Talisman
talismans.description: Talisman depicting a red ancient dragon. Boosts fire damage negation.

talismans.name: Fire Scorpion Charm
talismans.description: A talisman carried by assassins who strike unseen. Patterned on a scorpion freshly shed of its exoskeleton, its claws seizing a heart that burns with fire.
talismans.effect: Raises fire attack, but lowers damage negation

talismans.name: Godskin Swaddling Cloth
talismans.description: Sacred cloth of the Godskin Apostles, made from supple skin sewn together.

talismans.name: Faithful's Canvas Talisman
talismans.description: A talisman bearing an icon that depicts a group of masked figures. Raises potency of incantations.

talismans.name: Great-jar's Arsenal
talismans.description: A charm that resembles a great jar overflowing with weaponry. Vastly boosts maximum equipment load.

talismans.name: Haligdrake Talisman
talismans.description: Talisman depicting a golden ancient dragon. Boosts holy damage negation.

talismans.name: Green Turtle Talisman
talismans.description: A talisman in the shape of a green turtle. Raises stamina recovery speed.

talismans.name: Hammer Talisman
talismans.description: A talisman depicting a hammer and a knight. Enhances stamina-reducing attacks against a blocking opponent.

talismans.name: Immunizing Horn Charm
talismans.description: An accountrement worn by the ancestral followers. Raises immunity. (Immunity governs resistance to poison and rot.)

talismans.name: Kindred Of Rot's Exultation
talismans.description: A talisman depicting the exultation of pests.
talismans.effect: Poisoning or rot in vicinity increases attack power

talismans.name: Lightning Scorpion Charm
talismans.description: A talisman carried by assassins who strike unseen. Patterned on a scorpion freshly shed of its exoskeleton, its claws seizing a heart that sparks with lightning.
talismans.effect: Raises lightning attack, but lowers damage negation

talismans.name: Longtail Cat Talisman
talismans.description: A brooch depicting Lacrima, the long-tailed cat.
talismans.effect: Renders the wearer immune to fall damage

talismans.name: Marika's Scarseal
talismans.description: An eye engraved with an Elden Rune. Said to be the seal of Queen Marika.
talismans.effect: Raises attributes, but also increases damage taken

talismans.name: Lord Of Blood's Exultation
talismans.description: A talisman depicting the exultation of the Lord of Blood.

talismans.name: Mottled Necklace
talismans.description: A vividly-colored accoutrement precious to the ancestral followers.

talismans.name: Moon Of Nokstella
talismans.description: This legendary talisman is a treasure of Nokstella, the Eternal City.

talismans.name: Old Lord's Talisman
talismans.description: A legendary talisman depicting the ancient king whose seat lies at the heart of the storm beyond time.

talismans.name: Pearldrake Talisman
talismans.description: Talisman depicting a pearlescent ancient dragon. Boosts non-physical damage negation.

talismans.name: Primal Glintstone Blade
talismans.description: An old glintstone blade that has been stained with blood.
talismans.effect: Spells consume less FP, but maximum HP is reduced

talismans.name: Prince Of Death's Pustule
talismans.description: A fetid pustule taken from facial flesh. Raises vitality. (Vitality governs resistance to the effects of Death.)

talismans.name: Radagon Icon
talismans.description: A legendary talisman depicting the Elden Lord Radagon. Shortens the casting time of sorceries and incantations.

talismans.name: Radagon's Scarseal
talismans.description: An eye engraved with an Elden Rune. Said to be the seal of King Consort Radagon.
talismans.effect: Raises attributes, but also increases damage taken.

talismans.name: Radagon's Soreseal
talismans.description: This legendary talisman is an eye engraved with an Elden Rune, said to be the seal of King Consort Radagon.
talismans.effect: Greatly raises attributes, but also increases damage taken

talismans.name: Sacred Scorpion Charm
talismans.description: A talisman carried by assassins who strike unseen. Patterned on a scorpion freshly shed of its exoskeleton, its claws seizing a heart with a blessed glow.
talismans.effect: Raises holy attack, but lowers damage negation.

talismans.name: Sacrificial Twig
talismans.description: A talisman fashioned from a dried twig, so slender that it might snap at the slightest touch.
talismans.effect: Will be lost on death in place of runes.

talismans.name: Shabriri's Woe
talismans.description: Disturbing likeness of a man whose eyes have been gouged out. The corners of his mouth are upturned in an almost flirtatious manner.

talismans.name: Spelldrake Talisman
talismans.description: Talisman depicting a blue ancient dragon. Boosts magic damage negation.

talismans.name: Stargazer Heirloom
talismans.description: A talisman engraved with the legend of a queen. Raises intelligence.

talismans.name: Twinblade Talisman
talismans.description: A talisman depicting a twinblade and a confessor. Enhances the final hit ending a chain of attacks.
talismans.effect: Enhances final hit of chain attacks.

talismans.name: Taker's Cameo
talismans.description: A talisman engraved with a stern likeness of Praetor Rykard, master of Volcano Manor.

talismans.name: Starscourge Heirloom
talismans.description: A talisman engraved with a scene from a heroic tale. Raises strength.

talismans.name: Viridian Amber Medallion
talismans.description: A medallion with viridian amber inlaid. Boosts maximum stamina. The Erdtree's old sap becomes amber, treasured as the most precious of jewels in the age of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. A primordial life energy resides inside

talismans.name: Two Fingers Heirloom
talismans.description: A talisman engraved with the legend of the Two Fingers. Raises faith.

talismans.name: Winged Sword Insignia
talismans.description: A talisman depicting a raised prosthetic blade. An honor bestowed upon the knights who fought alongside Malenia the Severed.
talismans.effect: Raises attack power with successive attacks

talismans.name: Erdtree's Favor
talismans.description: A talisman depicting a special blessing of the Erdtree. Slightly raises maximum HP, stamina, and equip load.
talismans.effect: Raises maximum HP, stamina and equip load

talismans.name: Crimson Seed Talisman
talismans.description: A crimson-colored talisman patterned after an Erdtree seed. Boosts HP restoration from the Flask of Crimson Tears.
talismans.effect: Boosts HP regeneration from Flask of Crimson Tears

talismans.name: Graven-school Talisman
talismans.description: A talisman depicting a school of graven mages, the nightmare of the academy.

talismans.name: Godfrey Icon
talismans.description: A legendary talisman depicting the Elden Lord Godfrey. Raises charge attack power of sorceries, incantations, and skills.

talismans.name: Lance Talisman
talismans.description: A talisman depicting a lance and a knight. Enhances attacks while on horseback.

talismans.name: Graven-mass Talisman
talismans.description: A talisman depicting the first school of graven mages — a nightmare that would continue to haunt the academy.  Greatly raises potency of sorceries.  The primeval current is a forbidden tradition of glintstone sorcery. To those who cleave to its teachings, the act of collecting sorcerers to fashion them into the seeds of stars is but another path of scientific inquiry.

talismans.name: Ancestral Spirit's Horn
talismans.description: Item cut from the horns of the Regal Ancestor Spirit.

talismans.name: Stalwart Horn Charm
talismans.description: An accoutrement worn by the ancestral followers. Greatly raises robustness. (Robustness governs resistance to blood loss and frost.)  Said to be a budding horn. The ancestral followers believe that the horns of a long-lived beast continue to bud like antlers, over and over again, until the beast one day becomes an ancestral spirit.

talismans.name: Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman
talismans.description: Legendary talisman of wrought iron depicting a massive ancient dragon. Enormously boosts physical damage negation.

talismans.name: Marika's Soreseal
talismans.description: This legendary talisman is an eye engraved with an Elden Rune, said to be the seal of Queen Marika.
talismans.effect: Greatly raises attributes, but also increases damage taken.

talismans.name: Gold Scarab
talismans.description: A talisman facsimile of a scarab, the carrier of treasures and precious things.

talismans.name: Ritual Sword Talisman
talismans.description: A talisman patterned after swords used in ritual combat held to honor the Erdtree.
talismans.effect: Raises attack power when HP is at maximum.

talismans.name: Ritual Shield Talisman
talismans.description: A talisman patterned after shields used in ritual combat held to honor the Erdtree.
talismans.effect: Raises defense when HP is at maximum.

talismans.name: Perfumer's Talisman
talismans.description: A talisman depicting a set of perfume bottles. Raises potency of perfume items.

talismans.name: Blue-feathered Branchsword
talismans.description: A talisman adorned with blue feathers, once used in ancient death rituals.
talismans.effect: Raises defense when HP is low.

talismans.name: Magic Scorpion Charm
talismans.description: A talisman carried by assassins who strike unseen. Patterned on a scorpion freshly shed of its exoskeleton, its claws seizing a heart that shimmers with magic.
talismans.effect: Raises magic attack, but lowers damage negation

talismans.name: Prince Of Death's Cyst
talismans.description: A fetid, overgrown cyst taken from facial flesh. Greatly raises vitality. (Vitality governs resistance to the effects of Death.)

talismans.name: Warrior Jar Shard
talismans.description: Shard of a shattered warrior jar.
talismans.effect: Boosts the attack power of skills.

talismans.name: Shard Of Alexander
talismans.description: Shard of the late Alexander, a shattered warrior jar.
talismans.effect: Greatly boosts the attack power of skills.

talismans.name: Greatshield Talisman
talismans.description: Talisman depicting a knight holding a greatshield. Boosts guarding ability.

talismans.name: Millicent's Prosthesis
talismans.description: Part of the golden prosthesis used by Millicent. The hand is locked into a fist that once raised a sword aloft.
talismans.effect: Boosts dexterity, raises attack power with successive attacks

talismans.name: Spear Talisman
talismans.description: A talisman depicting a spear and a soldier. Enhances the counterattacks that are unique to thrusting weapons.
talismans.effect: Enhances counterattacks unique to thrusting weapons

talismans.name: Dagger Talisman
talismans.description: A talisman depicting a dagger and a surgeon. Enhances critical hits.

talismans.name: Red-feathered Branchsword
talismans.description: A talisman adorned with red feathers, once used in ancient death rituals.
talismans.effect: Raises attack power when HP is low.

talismans.name: Companion Jar
talismans.description: A talisman given by the jars to their friends. Raises potency of thrown jars.

talismans.name: Flock's Canvas Talisman
talismans.description: A talisman bearing an icon that depicts a mass of masked figures. Greatly raises potency of incantations.

talismans.name: Concealing Veil
talismans.description: Talisman put together from dark cloth with a lustrous sheen
talismans.effect: Conceals wearer while crouching away from foes

talismans.name: Furled Finger's Trick-mirror
talismans.description: A small, clouded mirror that reflects a flesh-and-blood figure. Makes the bearer take on the appearance of a Host of Fingers One of the ritual implements created by the Tarnished to deceive invaders.
talismans.effect: Take on appearance of a Host of Fingers

talismans.name: Crucible Feather Talisman
talismans.description: A talisman fashioned from feathers that embody the aspects of various creatures. Said to have grown on the human body long ago.
talismans.effect: Improves dodge rolling but increases damage taken

talismans.name: Daedicar's Woe
talismans.description: Disturbing likeness of a woman whose skin was flayed. She smiles with a serene tenderness.

talismans.name: Host's Trick-mirror
talismans.description: A small, clouded mirror that reflects a flesh-and-blood figure.
talismans.effect: Take on appearance of a cooperator

talismans.name: Entwining Umbilical Cord
talismans.description: Mysterious circular object that's oddly warped. Changes the demeanour of the wearer's actions.
